name: Bugster
description:
Just another normal day for a bug farmer... or is it?

In this short 3-level story driven FPS you are a bug farmer... there rest you'll find out.

This game was created with assets and guidance from MSU. In order to differentiate the game from the project I have made the following changes:

1. New lighting fitting the games theme and location

2. Story-led game with text-based cutscene elements

3. Three unique levels with special challanges

4. Tutorial menu and Objective menu in-game.

I hope you enjoy the game.

Created by: Daryl (Bard) Peel with assets from MSU
